name: coders
description: Spawn AI coding assistants (Claude, Gemini, Codex, OpenCode) in isolated tmux sessions with real-time monitoring dashboard, auto-generated session names, and git worktree support

features: Spawn Claude, Gemini, or OpenCode in isolated tmux sessions
Auto-generate descriptive session names from task descriptions
Real-time monitoring dashboard with heartbeat tracking (http://localhost:3030)
Git worktree support for parallel development branches
Background task automation with monitoring scripts
Task-based spawning with context files (PRDs, specs)
requirements: Redis (optional, for dashboard and heartbeat monitoring)
